name: tags(in:unit:scheme:options:tokenRanges:)
desc: Returns an array of linguistic tags and token ranges for a given string range and linguistic unit.
declaration:
func tags(in range: NSRange, 
     unit: NSLinguisticTaggerUnit, 
   scheme: NSLinguisticTagScheme, 
  options: NSLinguisticTagger.Options = [], 
tokenRanges: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<NSArray?>?) -> [NSLinguisticTag]
